companyInfo.Competitors: Square 1 Bank, First Republic Bank, Comerica

jobDescription: Early Stage PracticeHere are the characteristics that the candidate must possess:Interest in the early stage startup ecosystemHighly analytical Articulate (both in writing, planning, event programming and social tools)Takes initiative and is creativeHard worker who works well under tight deadlinesHealthy curiosity and ambitionThe responsibilities of the ESP Analytics intern will include:Directly reporting to the group’s managing directorsIndustry research and data analysisAbility to organize, combine and analyze large data sets using Excel and visualization tools like TableauPreparing and building internal and external presentations in PowerpointCandidates must be students currently enrolled in a graduate studies program at a college/university (Minimum Requirement)Candidate should have a minimum GPA of 3.5Seeking the following Majors: open most majors related to finance, data science, economics, statistics, mathematics or similarSeeking Graduate studentPreferred candidates should have work or academic experience in the following areas: data science, research, analytics, financial modeling, or statistical analysis.
